message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Alice, your product sounds interesting, but $180 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
I understand you think $180 is a bit high, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll sell it to you for $165.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $165 is still outside my budget. I'm willing to go up to $140, which would be a fair deal for both of us.
I understand you're trying to be fair, but I still need to make a profit. I can do $155, which is a bit higher than your offer, but still a compromise.
